message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?

Bob, I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to come down to $10,000, which is my absolute minimum. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,000, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,800?
